description: When a bottom sheet is generated one of the boilerplate tasks is to add the builder to the setup for the new bottom sheet. This modification performs that action.
template: BottomSheetType.{{sheetType}}: (context, sheetRequest, completer) => {{sheetName}}(completer: completer, request: sheetRequest),
error: It seems your file where custom bottom sheet builders are set is not in lib/ui/setup/setup_bottom_sheet_ui.dart. Add a stacked.json file and set \'bottom_sheet_custom_builders_path\' so we can locate your file.
name: Add \'{{sheetName}}\' custom builder
